definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נוֹחֲלָה ]] Ez Eze 19:5 (yet v. infr.); Impf. [[וַיִּיׇּ֫חֶל]] Ge 8:12 + 1Sa 13:18 Kt (v. Dr; Qr Hiph. [[וַיּוֹחֶל]]);—wait: Ge 8:12 and he waited yet seven days; so 1Sa 13:18 Kt; of Isr. under fig. of lioness, [[וַתֵּרֶא כִּי נוֹחֲלָה אָֽבְדָה תִּקְוׇתָהּ]] Ez Eze 19:5 when she saw that her hope tarried, was lost (but dub.; Sm comp. Aram. 0wh.d be weak, whence perh. sink down; Hi (perh. after LXX) [[כִּי נִדַּח לָהּ]] that he was thrust away from her; Co plausibly [[נוֹאֲלָה]] that she had acted foolishly).
wait, tarry for, sq. [[לְ]] Mic 5:6 (of rain, ‖[[יְקַוֶּה]]); so Mic 1:12 acc. to We, who reads [[יִחֲלָה]] (Pf.) for [[חָלָה]]; abs. wait Job 14:14.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹתַ֫לְתִּי]] Job 32:11, etc.; [[וְהוֹתַ֫לְתִּי]] (consec., v. Hi De:2 Dr:§:§ 106, 119r) Job 32:16; Impf. [[וַיּ֫וֹחֶל]] 1Sa 13:8 Qr; 2 ms. [[תּוֹחֵל]] 1Sa 10:8; [[אוֹחִיל]] 2Ki 6:33, La 3:21, La 3:24; [[אוֹתִּ֫ילָה]] Je 4:19 Qr (Kt [[אָחוּלָה]]), Mic 7:7; [[אׂחִילָה]] 2Sa 18:14; —wait, tarry, abs.
